long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smash Karts Unblocked is a fast-paced, multiplayer kart racing game that combines high-speed racing with intense combat elements. Players race around various tracks in karts, collecting weapons and power-ups to take out opponents while trying to earn the highest score within the time limit. Known for its fun, arcade-style gameplay and cartoonish graphics, Smash Karts offers an exhilarating and competitive gaming experience.

How to Play
In Smash Karts, players control a kart and compete against others in an arena. The aim is to collect items from mystery boxes scattered around the track and use them to attack opponents or defend oneself. Points are earned by knocking out other karts and collecting coins. The player with the most points at the end of the time limit wins the round.

Game Controls
Arrow Keys or WASD: Drive the kart.
Space Bar: Use collected items and weapons.
Enter Key: Chat during gameplay (in some versions).

Play other games on the top-left menu.
